post:
<center>![](https://media.giphy.com/media/mpjdfmomX94yc/giphy.gif "")

2019 has been an eventful but fun and productive year. I would like to take this moment to thank our clients for their continued support and trust in our brand.

With our aim being to continually improve our service and expand our offerings, we are pleased to have accomplished finally getting an LA location this year as well as getting our first AMD node there also.
<hr>

<font size="4">s</font><font size="5">o</font><font size="6">o</font><font size="7">o....</font><br><font size="6">Who Is HostDoc?</font>
HostDoc Hosting was formed to provide excellence in performance hosting and transparancy of services offered.
We display a complete [uptime status report](https://hostdoc.co.uk/status). Announce expected disruptions and guarantee 99.7% uptime.
We are a small team of 3 who work tirelessly to provide an exceptionally affordable service with 24 hour support via numerous support channels.
Incorporated in Q4 2017 as HostDoc Hosting Limited in the United Kingdom.
<hr>

Features
Choice of 11 deployable locations.
Full root access.
Virtualizor Control Panel.
Weekly offsite backup
One free snapshot restore per month.
KVM Virtualization.
24/7 Technical Support.
Pre-configured and customisable packages
NoVNC Console
Huge library of OS and ISOs
Custom ISO Uploads
Host Passthrough
Nested Virtualisation
Scalable Plans
Stackable Plans
<hr>
